entry.p: This is just a brief note that folks interested in Aristotle, Ayn Rand, the psychology of happiness, or any combination thereof might enjoy my review of Roger E. Bissell and Vinay Kolhatkar's new book Modernizing Aristotle's Ethics: Toward a New Art and Science of Self-Actualization, just published in Issue 44, No. 1 of the interdisciplinary journal Reason Papers. Check it out!
